SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.math.vector

Class VectorMapper<V extends Vector>

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.vector.VectorMapper<V>
Type Parameters:
V - The type of vector to rearrange
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function<V,V>, UnaryOperator<V>
public final class VectorMapper<V extends Vector> extends Object implements UnaryOperator<V>
A mapper class for rearranging vector components. This is intended to be used as a function.

final Vector3 v = new Vector3(1, 2, 3);
final Vector3 p = VectorMapper.V3_SWAP_X_Z.apply(v); // {3, 2, 1}
